name: COLOUR
description:
A strange cube has appeared in your house. With colours you have never seen. What will happen once you touch it?

This is a 48 hour game made for the Minimalistic Jam~

Music: "Ascending" by Eric Skiff

Controls: Arrow Keys to move and Spacebar to jump

EDIT:  Winner of the Minimalist Jam. Thank you for all the people that played it :P
